thread.section_title: Point A Hotel, London Liverpool Street - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely, comfortable and convenient hotel
thread.title_full: Lovely, comfortable and convenient hotel - Review of Point A Hotel, London Liverpool Street, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Lisa_LTN
title: Lovely, comfortable and convenient hotel
text: From the minute I arrived the staff were friendly and welcoming, the room was clean and comfortable and definitely exceeded my expectations given that it was so cheap. The bed was very comfy and on the fourth floor I wasn't disturbed by any outside noise. The location is ideal for Liverpool Street station and the bars in Shoreditch.
